A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A film with so many plot holes and faults to go into detail (watch angry Joe and the daily uprising as they cover all of the faults)\, a Hollywood cash grab without the slightest interest in storytelling\, side missions that don't make the slightest impact on what's going on. It almost feels like the writers and directors didn't even watch the force awakens let alone any other star wars films or literature on the franchises
